TU_DESCRIPTION: Changes the name or emoji of your tags
TAG_NOT_FOUND: {{author}} Could not find any `Tag` with the name `{{tag}}`
EMBED_DESCRIPTION: Which part of the following `Tag` would you like to update: `{{tagName}}`?
EMBED_FOOTER: Use the buttons below to continue
REPLACE_NAME: Enter a new name that will replace `{{tagName}}`
TAGNAME_EXISTS: {{author}} You already have a`Tag` with the name `{{newTagName}}`. Please choose a different name and try again
WRONG_TAGNAME_FORMAT: {{author}} The name of your `Tag` must be alphanumeric and must not contain special characters, spaces or profanity
TAGNAME_LONG: {{author}} A `Tag` name can contain a maximum of 20 characters
REPLACE_NAME_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure that you want to change the `Tag` name from `{{oldTag}}` to `{{newTag}}`?
REPLACE_NAME_SUCCESSFULL: The name of your `Tag` has been successfully changed from `{{oldTag}} to `{{newTag}}`
REPLACE_EMOJI: Enter the emoji that you want to replace {{emoji}} with
TAGEMOJI_EXISTS: {{author}} A `Tag` with the emoji {{newEmoji}} already exists. Please choose a different emoji
WRONG_TAGEMOJI_FORMAT: {{author}} A `Tag` with the emoji {{newEmoji}} already exists. Please choose a different emoji
REPLACE_EMOJI_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to chane the `Tag` emoji from {{oldEmoji}} to {{newEmoji}}?
REPLACE_EMOJI_SUCCESSFULL: The emoji of this `Tag` emoji has been successfully updated from {{oldEmoji}} to {{newEmoji}}
